name: Healthyfied Pea Hummus
description: This Healthyfied Pea Hummus is perfect for anyone following a ketogenic, low carb, diabetic-friendly, low sodium, and low sugar diet. Crafted with wholesome ingredients, this hummus promises a delicious way to stick to your health goals. Dive into the delightful world of Healthy Recipes with this easy-to-make, nutritious snack.
recipeIngredient: 30 g POD Plain Plant Pea Protein

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the ingredients: measure and set aside Olive oil, Salt, Garlic powder, Lemon juice, Water, POD Plain Plant Pea Protein, Black pepper, and dried Basil.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: In a blender or food processor, combine all the ingredients: Olive oil, Salt, Garlic powder, Lemon juice, Water, POD Plain Plant Pea Protein, Black pepper, and dried Basil.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Blend the mixture on high speed until smooth and creamy, about 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Taste and adjust seasoning as needed, adding more salt, lemon juice, or garlic powder according to your preference.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer the hummus to a serving bowl and drizzle with a bit of olive oil, and optionally garnish with a sprinkle of black pepper and dried basil.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5
